trans-unit.source: Provides data for a <xref href="System.Web.UI.Design.IControlDesignerView.ViewEvent"></xref> event that is raised when the template mode changes for a control on the design surface.
trans-unit.target: 提供資料給<xref href="System.Web.UI.Design.IControlDesignerView.ViewEvent"></xref>範本模式下變更控制項的設計介面上時所引發的事件。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.IControlDesignerView.ViewEvent> event is raised by a designer host, such as [!INCLUDE[vsprvslong](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)], for certain actions on a control on the design surface.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.IControlDesignerView.ViewEvent>引發由設計工具主應用程式，例如[!INCLUDE[vsprvslong](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)]，對於某些動作的控制項的設計介面上。</xref:System.Web.UI.Design.IControlDesignerView.ViewEvent>

trans-unit.source: For example, an event is raised when you enter or exit template editing mode for a control.
trans-unit.target: 例如，當您輸入或結束範本編輯模式的控制項可以引發事件。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner> class supplies a default delegate to handle the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.IControlDesignerView.ViewEvent> event.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner>類別提供的預設委派處理<xref:System.Web.UI.Design.IControlDesignerView.ViewEvent>事件。</xref:System.Web.UI.Design.IControlDesignerView.ViewEvent> </xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner>

trans-unit.source: When you exit or enter template editing mode, the designer host initializes a <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEventArgs> object for a <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEvent.TemplateModeChanged> event type, and then sets the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEventArgs.EventArgs%2A> property with a TemplateModeChangedEventArgs object.
trans-unit.target: 當您結束或輸入範本編輯模式時，設計工具主應用程式初始化<xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEventArgs>物件<xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEvent.TemplateModeChanged>事件類型，然後按一下 設定<xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEventArgs.EventArgs%2A>TemplateModeChangedEventArgs 物件的屬性。</xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEventArgs.EventArgs%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEvent.TemplateModeChanged> </xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEventArgs>

trans-unit.source: When the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEventArgs> object indicates that the template mode has changed, the default delegate in the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner> class updates the value for the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.InTemplateMode%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 當<xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEventArgs>物件表示範本模式已變更中的預設委派<xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner>類別更新的值<xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.InTemplateMode%2A>屬性。</xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.InTemplateMode%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner> </xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEventArgs>

trans-unit.source: Custom designers that are derived from the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.TemplatedControlDesigner> class can override the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.TemplatedControlDesigner.OnTemplateModeChanged%2A> method to perform additional processing when the template editing mode changes for a control on the design surface.
trans-unit.target: 衍生自的自訂設計工具<xref:System.Web.UI.Design.TemplatedControlDesigner>類別可以覆寫<xref:System.Web.UI.Design.TemplatedControlDesigner.OnTemplateModeChanged%2A>方法，以執行額外處理時的樣板編輯模式變更為設計介面上的控制項。</xref:System.Web.UI.Design.TemplatedControlDesigner.OnTemplateModeChanged%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.Design.TemplatedControlDesigner>

trans-unit.source: For more information about events and delegates, see [NIB: Events and Delegates](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/d98fd58b-fa4f-4598-8378-addf4355a115).
trans-unit.target: 如需有關事件和委派的詳細資訊，請參閱[NIB︰ 事件和委派](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/d98fd58b-fa4f-4598-8378-addf4355a115)。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.Design.TemplateModeChangedEventArgs"></xref> class with the specified template group.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新執行個體<xref href="System.Web.UI.Design.TemplateModeChangedEventArgs"></xref>與指定的範本群組的類別。

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.IControlDesignerView.ViewEvent> delegate method uses the TemplateModeChangedEventArgs constructor to initialize a <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.TemplateModeChangedEventArgs> object for use with a <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEventArgs> object.
trans-unit.target: A<xref:System.Web.UI.Design.IControlDesignerView.ViewEvent>委派方法會使用 TemplateModeChangedEventArgs 建構函式來初始化<xref:System.Web.UI.Design.TemplateModeChangedEventArgs>物件搭配使用<xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEventArgs>物件。</xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEventArgs> </xref:System.Web.UI.Design.TemplateModeChangedEventArgs> </xref:System.Web.UI.Design.IControlDesignerView.ViewEvent>

trans-unit.source: When you exit or enter template editing mode, the designer host initializes a <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEventArgs> object for a <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEvent.TemplateModeChanged> event type, and then sets the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEventArgs.EventArgs%2A> property with a <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.TemplateModeChangedEventArgs> object.
trans-unit.target: 當您結束或輸入範本編輯模式時，設計工具主應用程式初始化<xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEventArgs>物件<xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEvent.TemplateModeChanged>事件類型，然後按一下 設定<xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEventArgs.EventArgs%2A>屬性<xref:System.Web.UI.Design.TemplateModeChangedEventArgs>物件。</xref:System.Web.UI.Design.TemplateModeChangedEventArgs> </xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEventArgs.EventArgs%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEvent.TemplateModeChanged> </xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEventArgs>

trans-unit.source: The `newTemplateGroup` parameter specifies a new template group when you enter template editing mode.
trans-unit.target: `newTemplateGroup`參數指定新的範本群組，當您輸入範本編輯模式。

trans-unit.source: The `newTemplateGroup` parameter is typically `null` for exiting template editing mode.
trans-unit.target: `newTemplateGroup`參數通常是`null`結束範本編輯模式。

trans-unit.source: A new template group that is used to initialize the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.TemplateModeChangedEventArgs.NewTemplateGroup*>.
Gets the template group that was created when you entered template editing mode.
trans-unit.target: 取得範本群組進入編輯模式範本時所建立。

trans-unit.source: The NewTemplateGroup property specifies a new template group when you enter template editing mode.
trans-unit.target: NewTemplateGroup 屬性指定新的範本群組時輸入樣板編輯模式。

trans-unit.source: NewTemplateGroup is `null`for events that are raised when you exit template editing mode.
trans-unit.target: NewTemplateGroup 是`null`結束範本編輯模式時所引發的事件。

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Web.UI.Design.TemplateGroup"></xref> if you entered template editing mode with a new template; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Web.UI.Design.TemplateGroup"> </xref>如果輸入範本編輯模式，使用新的範本; 否則<xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref>。
